"use strict";
const https = require("http");
class LogQueue {
    constructor(logless) {
        this.logless = logless;
        this._queue = [];
    }
    enqueue(log) {
        this._queue.push(log);
    }
    flush() {
        const logBatch = {
            source: this.logless.source(),
            transactionID: this.logless.transactionID(),
            logs: new Array()
        };
        for (let log of this._queue) {
            const timestamp = log.timestampAsISOString();
            let payload = log.data;
            Eif (payload.length === 1) {
                payload = log.data[0];
            }
            const logJSON = {
                payload: payload,
                type: LogType[log.type],
                timestamp: timestamp,
            };
            if (log.tags !== undefined && log.tags !== null) {
                logJSON.tags = log.tags;
            }
            logBatch.logs.push(logJSON);
        }
        const dataAsString = JSON.stringify(logBatch);
        const dataLength = Buffer.byteLength(dataAsString);
        const options = {
            host: "logless.io",
            port: 443,
            path: "/capture",
            method: "POST",
            headers: {
                "Content-Type": "application/json",
                "Content-Length": dataLength
            }
        };
        const httpRequest = this.httpRequest(options, function (response) {
            response.setEncoding("utf8");
            response.on("data", function (chunk) {
                console.log("Response: " + chunk);
            });
        });
        httpRequest.write(dataAsString);
        httpRequest.end();
    }
    httpRequest(options, callback) {
        return https.request(options, callback);
    }
}
exports.LogQueue = LogQueue;
(function (LogType) {
    LogType[LogType["DEBUG"] = 0] = "DEBUG";
    LogType[LogType["ERROR"] = 1] = "ERROR";
    LogType[LogType["INFO"] = 2] = "INFO";
    LogType[LogType["TRACE"] = 3] = "TRACE";
    LogType[LogType["WARN"] = 4] = "WARN";
})(exports.LogType || (exports.LogType = {}));
var LogType = exports.LogType;
class Log {
    constructor(type, data, tags) {
        this.type = type;
        this.data = data;
        this.tags = tags;
        this._timestamp = new Date();
    }
    dataAsString() {
        let buffer = new Buffer("");
        for (let b of this.data) {
            buffer = Buffer.concat([buffer, b]);
        }
        return buffer.toString();
    }
    timestampAsISOString() {
        return this._timestamp.toISOString();
    }
}
exports.Log = Log;
